alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 1:31PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm wind gusts may impact portions of Park County through 300 PM MDT... At 126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms developing from near Livingston west into southwest Montana, moving northeast at 35 mph. As these storms move across the Paradise valley and into the Livingston area they may produce locally strong wind gusts. These sudden strong gusts may arrive well ahead of any thunder or precipitation. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Springdale, Chico and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Persons in campgrounds or outdoors should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
